title: Introducing: Dresage
body:
Really dig the jazz edge to this soulful pop from **Dresage** aka Keeley Bumford.

There’s a real classic feel to the songwriting, simmering with an almost Gatsby-esque elegance at points, in particular on recent single _Renaissance_. Production wise she manages to seamlessly blur the boundaries between organic and electronic, allowing a plethora of different sounds and genres to merge together. Check out both tracks below.

excerpt.full: Really dig the jazz edge to this soulful pop from Dresage aka Keeley Bumford. There’s a real classic feel to the songwriting, simmering with an almost Gatsby-esque elegance at points, in particular on recent single Renaissance. Production wise she manages to seamlessly blur the boundaries between organic and electronic, allowing a plethora of different sounds \[…\]
